void '''SetActorPitch''' (int ''tid'', int ''pitch'') ==Usage== Sets the actor's Pitch. Pitch is a [[definitions|fixed point angle]]. See [[GetActorPitch]] for the possible range. === Parameters === * ''tid'': TID of thing. * ''pitch'': Pitch to set. == Examples == This script will reset (or center) the pitch of the activator. 
script 1 (void)
{
  SetActorPitch(0, 0);
}
For more advanced uses, see the [[Cleaned_up_Third_Person_Cam]] example. [[category:ACS Actor functions]]
